alert.note: Alert for Central Plaquemines; Lower Jefferson; Lower Lafourche; Lower Terrebonne; St. Charles; Upper Jefferson; Upper Lafourche; Upper Plaquemines; Upper Terrebonne (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 06 at 8:41AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern St. Charles, northeastern Terrebonne, central Lafourche, northwestern Jefferson and northwestern Plaquemines Parishes through 915 AM CDT... At 841 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Luling to near Houma. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Houma, Cut Off, Avondale, Larose, Marrero, Harvey, Timberlane, Belle Chasse, Galliano, Gretna, Westwego, Lockport, Jean Lafitte, Mathews, Luling, Boutte, Estelle, Montegut, Woodmere and Des Allemands. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in New Orleans.

area.areaDesc: Central Plaquemines; Lower Jefferson; Lower Lafourche; Lower Terrebonne; St. Charles; Upper Jefferson; Upper Lafourche; Upper Plaquemines; Upper Terrebonne
